Calcul.name: Calcul 0
Calcul.solverParams:
############################################## # Meteo related parameters # # Only considered by the ANIME3D solver ############################################## [METEO]
# Atmospheric pressure in pascal [type: double] # XXX 101325 dans TYAtmosphere.h AtmosPressure=101300. # Temperature in degres celsius [type: double] AtmosTemperature=20. # Hygrometry percent [type: double] # XXX 70 dans TYAtmosphere.h AtmosHygrometry=60. # initial (default) sound speed [type: double] AnalyticC0=340. # Wind direction 0 means from north to south [type: double] WindDirection=0. # Vertical temperature gradient [type: double] AnalyticGradC=0. # Vertical wind speed gradient [type: double] AnalyticGradV=0.
############################################## # Acoustic ray tracer related parameters # # Only considered by the ANIME3D solver ############################################## [ACOUSTICRAYTRACER]
# Ray tracing order propagation (0=From, 1=from receptor, 2=auto) [int] RayTracingOrder=0 # Sampler model 0=random, 1=uniform v1, 2= uniform v2, 3=horizontal [int] Discretization=2 # Number of rays per source [int] NbRaysPerSource=100000 # Maximum ray length in meter [float] MaxLength=5000 # Receptor radius in meter [float] SizeReceiver=2. # Accelerating structure parameter (0=brut force, 1=grid, 2=BVH, 3=KDTree) [int] Accelerator=3 # Maximal depth search for BVH or KDTree [int] MaxTreeDepth=12 # Minimum dihedral angle to add a diffraction cylinder [float] AngleDiffMin=5. # Diffraction ridge size in meter [float] CylindreThick=0.3 # Maximum events number for a ray [int] MaxProfondeur=10 # Allow ground reflections [bool] UseSol=0 # Maximum reflections events for a ray [int] MaxReflexion=0 # Maximum diffraction events for a ray [int] MaxDiffraction=2 # Use random sampler instead of regular distribution [bool] DiffractionUseRandomSampler=0 # Number of ray thrown after diffraction (0 = based on source sampling, >0 = forced) [int] NbRayWithDiffraction=0 # Drop down number of rays thrown after a diffraction [bool] DiffractionDropDownNbRays=1 # Do not create rays outside the correct angle [bool] DiffractionFilterRayAtCreation=0 # Allow use of path length difference validation [bool] UsePathDifValidation=0 # Maximum path length difference in meter (25 meters for 25 dB, 8 meters for 20 dB) [float] MaxPathDifference=25. # Allow suppressing rays passing to far from the ridge [bool] DiffractionUseDistanceAsFilter=1 # Keep invalid rays [bool] KeepDebugRay=0 # Use of post-filters [bool] UsePostFilters=1 # # Targeting parameters ################# # # Use targeting [bool] #EnableTargets=0 # Sample ground in 2D [float] #SampleGround2D=0 # Set target search after a diffuse event [bool] EnableFullTargets=0 # Sampling density for interesting areas [float] TargetsDensity=0.1
############################################## # Analytic ray tracer related parameters # # Only considered by the ANIME3D solver ############################################## [ANALYTICRAYTRACER] # Sampler model 1=horizontal, 2=vertical, 3=uniform v1, 4=uniform v2 [int] #CurveRaySampler=1 # Start vertical angle (theta) [float] InitialAngleTheta=0. # Final vertical angle (theta) [float] #FinalAngleTheta=0. # Start horizontal angle (phi) [float] InitialAnglePhi=0. # Final horizontal angle (phi) [float] #FinalAnglePhi=360. # Number of rays per source [int] AnalyticNbRay=20 # Propagation time in second [double] AnalyticTMax=10. # Time step in second [double] AnalyticH=0.1 # Maximum length propagation [double] AnalyticDMax=3000
############################################## # Geometric transformer related parameters # # Only considered by the ANIME3D solver ############################################## [GEOMTRANSFORMER] # Transformation method (1 is the only [good] response) [int] AnalyticTypeTransfo=1 # Altimetry refinement parameter [float] #MeshRefinementValue=0 # Restore modified altimetry after computing [bool] #RestitModifiedGeom=0
############################################## # Preprocessing related parameters ############################################## [PREPROCESSING] # Source-receptor minimal distance in meters [float] #MinSRDistance=0.3
############################################## # Default solver related parameters # # Only considered by the default solver ############################################## [DEFAULTSOLVER] NbThreads=4 # Use of real ground (0) or totally reflective ground (1) [bool] UseRealGround=1 # Takes vegetation into account [bool] #UseVegetation=0 # Takes screens into account [bool] #UseScreen=1 # Lateral diffractions computing (if screens on) [bool] UseLateralDiffraction=1 # Takes reflections in account (first order only) [bool] UseReflection=1 # Propagation conditions (non refracting / downward conditions (ISO 9613)) [bool] PropaConditions=0 # H1 parameter (ISO 9613 downward conditions) [float] H1parameter=10. # Energetic (pÃÂ² summation) or interference (p summation) [bool] ModSummation=0
############################################## # ANIME3D solver related parameters # # Only considered by the ANIME3D solver ############################################## [ANIME3DSOLVER] # Takes meteo in account [bool] UseMeteo=0 # Rays oversampling rate (if meteo -see above-) [float] OverSampleD=0 # Use Fresnel area [bool] UseFresnelArea=0 # Value of relative uncertainty [float] Anime3DSigma=0. # Force 'C' parameter to 0 or 1 (will be computed from totalRayLength for any other value) [int] Anime3DForceC=1
############################################## # Debugging related parameters # # Only considered by the ANIME3D solver ############################################## [DEBUG] # allow use of closeEventSelector [bool] DebugUseCloseEventSelector=1 # allow use of diffraction angle selector [bool] DebugUseDiffractionAngleSelector=1 # allow use of diffraction path length selector [bool] DebugUseDiffractionPathSelector=1 # allow use of Fermat selector [bool] DebugUseFermatSelector=1 # allow use of (doubled) faces selector [bool] DebugUseFaceSelector=1
